review: Works as described.  Nice for times when you want to send something to the TV via wifi.  Make sure you have a spare USB power port on the back of your TV to avoid having to plug in a transformer - yes it need separate power..
author: N. Cameron

review: Best gadget I've bought for 30 bucks. Worse awesome and so many additional apps available for it. Highly recommend it for anyone who likes to stream movies using pled or HBO GO.
author: mike

review: Bought this for a TV that's just not as smart as I would hope.. about 6 months too old before they got REALLY good... I honestly prefer this over the built in interfaces of my other, "smarter" TVs. I can navigate right from my phone or tablet and send right over with no hassle. I can switch from Netflix, Youtube, AmazonPrime without having to exit out of one app and going to the other.And any changes/actions are basically instant.. I love it!
author: Eins-tein

review: Nice functionality on drawback 720p be nice full resolution
author: Wayne H.

review: Excellent item, I'm very happy with this purchase.
author: Alexis Aviles

review: It's great, the only thing is that I cannot see the local movies that I have on the iPad.But it works perfectly with Netflix
author: german Pereyra

review: Works, then doesn't work. Why can't anyone make something that is easy to hookup, easy to setup and use.
author: MovingTarget "referee5038"
